prod_color_descrip: shades of brilliant red and white with gloss black accents
prod_descrip: Hand-screened wallpaper printed in the USA with earth-friendly, water-based inks
prod_specs:
REPEAT: 39" MATCH: HALF DROP

HAND-PRINTED ON: HEAVYWEIGHT PAPER

SINGLE ROLL: 27" WIDE X 5 YARDS LONG

PACKED IN DOUBLE AND TRIPLE ROLLS

UNTRIMMED

ASTM-E84 CLASS A

EARTH-FRIENDLY WATER-BASED INKS

MADE IN THE USA
prod_t_1:
Promenade -
This peppy, preppy festival of tulips was inspired by the tulip beds abloom each spring on the Brooklyn Heights Promenade - our neighborhood hang-out. The fresh, banded formation and playful colorways bring to life that first pop of spring.

Learn more about the birth of this pattern in THE DESIGN PAD
prod_t_2: download PDF
prod_t_4: The New York Times TIME - Style & Design
prod_t_5:
Want to change the colors of this wallpaper? Or print on another ground option?

All twenty2 wallpapers can be easily customized. Learn more.
prod_t_6: Our wallpapers are hand-printed on heavy weight papers with resilient inks that can be gently wiped clean with a non-abrasive sponge or cloth and mild soap and water. We always suggest testing your cleaning method in a discreet spot on the wall before implementing in a large area.
prod_t_7:
INSTOCK ITEMS
Your order will ship within 1-2 business days if your item is in stock. The ship date may vary based upon availability of each item.

NOT IN STOCK ITEMS
The lead time for any product will be listed right above the price when you are viewing a specific product. If we are printing a wallpaper for you, you can choose RUSH IT during the check-out process to decrease the lead time.

MEMO SAMPLES
Memo sample orders are shipped via the US Postal Service unless otherwise specified during checkout.

RETURNS
As our products are made by hand and are manufactured and sold from specific dye lots, we cannot accept returns. We strongly suggest ordering memo samples to review the color and quality in person before ordering. Once you receive your order, please carefully inspect your product to ensure that it is in good condition and in the quantity you ordered.
prod_sm_title: Hand-printed wallpaper by twenty2 | Promenade in pin-up
